metadata.dc:title: Cervical schwannomas and postquirurgical neuropathies
metadata.dc:description: This article report four cases of schwannomas originating in the cervical peripheral nervous branches, which were operated by ENT Department between 1991 and 2004. The difficulty on differential diagnosis and possible complications after the surgery are commented. Speaking of these cases, reference is done about the manage of post surgical neuropathy, very common after interventions on neural or perineural tumour of orocervicofacial area
metadata.dc:creator: Álamo Rodríguez, M. J
Herguido Bóveda, M. J
Andrés Ares, J
Lasso Luis, O
Galán Morales, J
metadata.dc:description: Se presentan cuatro casos de schwannoma dependientes de las ramas nerviosas periféricas cervicales, intervenidos entre 1991 y 2004 por el Servicio de Otorrinolaringología, su dificultad en el diagnóstico diferencial y las posibles complicaciones de su tratamiento quirúrgico. A propósito del mismo, se hace referencia al manejo de las neuropatías posquirúrgicas, habituales tras la cirugía de tumoraciones neurales o perineurales en el área orocervicofacial
metadata.dc:source: An Otorrinolaringol Ibero Am;33(2): 139-149, mar.-abr. 2006. ilus, tab
metadata.dc:title: Schwannomas cervicales y neuropatías posquirúrgicas
